chapters.title: Chapter 11:  A Hell in Maderin
chapters.info:
Ravashi Paendrag,
      p. 285â€”Daughter of Radhanan and older sister
      of Tuon, among the family of the
      Empress of Seanchan.  She is close to Tuon's age,
      and according to Tuon believes she should have been named heir because
      she is older than Tuon.  According to
      Semirhage, Ravashi is dead along
      with the rest of Tuon's relatives.
      See also
      Empress (of Seanchan), The;
      Paendrag, Aurana;
      Paendrag, Chimal;
      Paendrag, Radhanan;
      Paendrag, Tuon Athaem Kore.
